hello, is libflashsupport still required: in flash9 there was an issue with the audio that prompted me to install libflashsupport.

Sorry, yes, if you want to be able to use flash and use applications that are set to output to pulseaudio you need either libflashsupport or there is a more stable alternative you can grab from intrepid
It will work with flash 9 as well AFIK

There is a difference between flash10 and the intrepid package for flash 10, the intrepid package for flash 10 depends on things which are only available in intrepid ( because that is what it was made for ) but flash 10 itself does not ( though it won't work with pulseaudio without some extra package )
That is the more stable alternative to libflashplugin
You will need to get it from intrepid as well
I see. But there is no need to update libasound2-plugins I suppose?
Someone said earlier that there is something important about the intrepid version
are those intrepid versions? If libasound2-plugin is required from the intrepid version how would I go about installing it?
since audio works on other stuff and on flash without libflashsupport installed now I suppose that it's not a very big deal then?
I guess, are you using pulseaudio ? ( if not then you don't need libasound-2-plugins or libflashsupport )
yeah, I am. It comes installed on hardy.
